snippet: The pianist Geri Allen’s quartet the Timeline Band played at Jazz Standard with tap-dance contributions from Maurice Chestnut. The two have collaborated since 2007.
abstract: Brian Seibert reviews performance by tap dancer Maurice Chestnut as part of pianist Geri Allen's Timeline Band at Jazz Standard.
lead_paragraph: The pianist Geri Allen’s quartet the Timeline Band played at Jazz Standard with tap-dance contributions from Maurice Chestnut. The two have collaborated since 2007.

headline.seo: Maurice Chestnut With Timeline Band at Jazz Standard
headline.main: Lending a Slide and Scoot to a Jazz Beat
headline.print_headline: Lending a Slide and Scoot to a Jazz Beat
